channel.title: Android MerchTool Beta now on Android Market
channel.description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.merchtool&feature=search_result
Try it out and report as many bugs as you possibly can so that i may patch up and release a final version.

item.title: Android MerchTool Beta now on Android Market
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Congratulations on this! It’s good to see new items are coming out to improve stuff like this.

Couple of other items I can think of if your interested in makin ga “pro” version.

The G.E. merch part could be free

-how about a “buyer” part that is pro that will buy a new item when your old stuff has sold?
-“task ticks” notifications For example when your able to do bork again it would chirp you.
-considering RS is too nooby to do it I guess you could do it via the tool… make it so like there is a “global box” and those with the pro version can actually private message offline friends on a non rs related message box.

Read full topic
item.source: Android MerchTool Beta now on Android Market
